note structure

metadata (not shown):

  • title
  • permalink
  • isnote: true
  • layout
  • category
  • tags
  • references
  • related_notes
  • list (if applicable)
  • list_order (if applicable)
  • note_id
  • excerpt (if applicable, mainly for references)

note body:

  • category
  • title heading
  • content
  • related notes
  • references
  • tags
